verses.name: Acts 9:18
verses.text: And immediately there fell from his eyes as it had been scales: and he received sight forthwith, and arose, and was baptized.

verses.name: Acts 9:19
verses.text: And when he had received meat, he was strengthened. Then was Saul certain days with the disciples which were at Damascus.

verses.name: Acts 9:20
verses.text: And straightway he preached Christ in the synagogues, that he is the Son of God.

verses.name: Acts 9:21
verses.text: But all that heard him were amazed, and said; Is not this he that destroyed them which called on this name in Jerusalem, and came hither for that intent, that he might bring them bound unto the chief priests?
